text: "If you really want to defeat Trump, you shouldn’t allow your personal hatred or overweening pride to blind you to what’s going on at this convention," writes @MattKLewis https://t.co/s7D9EOjE20

name: thedailybeast
text: Two of the immigrants featured in a naturalization ceremony led by President Trump and shown during the second night of the #RNC2020 didn’t know they would be part of the convention https://t.co/wkM8wtXxNV

name: thedailybeast
text:
Tonight, Vice President Mike Pence will be the featured speaker of the #RNC2020. Join us for live coverage starting at 8:30 p.m. ET.

Also, read our recap about how the president and his team openly flouted ethics laws on night two of the convention. https://t.co/EKy0qf9VvU
